docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In the annals of biochemistry it would be hard to find a more enigmatic and intriguing substance than the neurotransmitting chemical called serotonin.

headline.main: THE INTRIGUING POTENTIAL OF MOLECULAR SWITCHES
